about_the_game:
In Etherland Tactics, embark on an epic journey with a diverse group of characters who, after a mysterious event during a space exploration mission, find themselves stranded on a planet where a strange energy makes magic and fantastical creatures possible. Uncover the secrets of this captivating world as you delve into an engaging narrative, face challenging tactical battles, and enjoy deep character customization. Prove yourself as the ultimate strategist in Etherland Tactics!

Two years ago, a group of space explorers vanished after losing contact while passing by a mysterious planet. Since then, no trace of them has been found. Now, Jack, the son of two of the missing explorers, turns 20 and, after dedicating the last two years of his life to training, is ready to embark on his own expedition to uncover the fate of his parents.

Joined by Eliza, a brilliant engineer, and a team of explorers, Jack heads towards the enigmatic planet. However, the expedition takes an unexpected turn when they are drawn in by a mystical energy that leads them to a fantastical world. There, as they face new challenges, they begin to realize that the events bringing them to this place may be connected to the disappearance of the original team.

  • Turn-Based Tactical Combat: Strategic and dynamic, perfect for fans of the genre.

  • Advanced Class System: Customize your character with a high level of personalization.

  • Customizable Abilities: Modify each ability to make your character truly unique.

  • Immersive Exploration: Move freely through environments outside of combat, diving into a rich and detailed world.

  • Memorable Characters: Meet charismatic characters with skills and personalities that enhance both the narrative and gameplay.

  • Engaging Storyline: Follow an exciting plot, make new friends, and carve your own path on an unforgettable journey.

name: Etherland Tactics

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: x86_32 CPU with SSE2 instructions, or any x86_64 CPU Example: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200, AMD Athlon XE BE-2300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics with full Vulkan 1.0 support Example: Intel HD Graphics 5500 (Broadwell), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: x86_64 CPU with SSE4.2 instructions, with 4 physical cores or more Example: Intel Core i5-6600K, AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphics with full Vulkan 1.2 support Example: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 (Pascal), AMD Radeon RX 460 (GCN 4.0)
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A tactical RPG combining strategy, narrative, and extensive character and skill customization, set in a medieval fantasy world inspired by the giants of the genre.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Japanese
